name: Cube and Flags go Brr!
description:
My first published game, also a submission for the WOWIE! Jam 3.0 with the theme: Failure is Progress.

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

W, Space, Up arrow - Jump

You can speedrun the game aswell in categories such as:

first flag%

any%

all flags%

level x flag%

(in case anyone thinks its a virus: https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/5a0b3778c082e6e25dd93f37ef447d89bba6e91203ae...)
